meanings.definition: relating to or shaped like a lens
meanings.sent1: The glasses had lenticular lenses that helped me see better.
meanings.sent2: The camera had a lenticular filter to improve the quality of the photos.
meanings.sent3: I tried on lenticular glasses and suddenly everything looked bigger!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes had a lenticular clarity that seemed to magnify her gaze.
meanings.sent5: The lenticular shape of the crystal made it refract light in a unique way.

meanings.sent1: The lenticular clouds formed over the mountain peaks.
meanings.sent2: Pilots are cautious of flying near lenticular clouds due to turbulence.
meanings.sent3: The lenticular clouds looked like fluffy pancakes in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The lenticular clouds hung in the air like giant cotton balls.
meanings.sent5: The lenticular clouds created a stunning backdrop for the sunset.

meanings.definition: a type of printing process for creating 3D images
meanings.sent1: The artist used lenticular printing to make the picture pop out.
meanings.sent2: The lenticular print changed its image as you moved it.
meanings.sent3: I was amazed by the lenticular print that seemed to come to life.
meanings.sent4: The lenticular printing gave depth to the image, making it seem real.
meanings.sent5: The lenticular print was so cool, it felt like the image was moving.
